name: One Chance (itch) (Shady Night)
description:
<FULLSCREEN RECOMMENDED>

Hello! I am Shady Night back with a new horror style game! This was made for a game jam - "20 Seconds Game Jam" in 8 days! It was a really fun experience!

-CONTROLS-

> [WASD] to move around.

> Mouse to look.

> [Left Click] to shoot (if you have the weapon).

> [E] to interact with something.

-NOTES-

It was first time for me that I joined a game jam. The theme for the jam was "20 Seconds" as the name suggests... I really liked to work on this game and it's also my first time to make my own horror game! I also learned a lot of new things about programming!!

All AUDIOS in this game are from Pixabay really nice audios! All models from Sketchfab - sick models!

Suggestions for my game is appreciated!!

-LINKS-

My Scratch account - https://scratch.mit.edu/users/Bal155/
